name: Peppercorn Lover's Burger
author: Anonymous
summary: There is nothing like a hot burger on a hot day. Simple and spicy, please your heat loving friends with these thick peppery burgers. Beat the heat by having lots of cold, refreshing drinks on hand.
ingredients: ½ cup A.1. Cracked Peppercorn Steak Sauce, divided
directions: Spray both sides of onion slices with cooking spray; set aside
Mix meat and 1/4 cup of the steak sauce; shape into four 1/2-inch-thick patties
Cook burgers an additional 5 minutes or until cooked through (160 degrees F), brushing occasionally with the remaining 1/4 cup steak sauce and turning onions after 3 min
Place burgers on bottom halves of rolls; cover with onions and tops of rolls
